params.description: The port on which to bind the cauldron server.
params.name: port
debug
params.description:
Whether or not the server should be run in debug mode. If true, the
server will echo debugging information during operation.

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Custom properties to alter the way the server runs.

doc:
Run the cauldron http server used to interact with cauldron from a remote
host
name: run_server
